definitions.definition: A device that circulates fresh air and expels stale or noxious air.
A machine that moves breathable air into and out of the lungs of a patient who is unable to breathe sufficiently.
Some behaviour or happening that relieves a tense atmosphere or situation .
A play or an actor so bad as to empty the theater .

main_definition: A device that circulates fresh air and expels stale or noxious air.
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) A machine that moves breathable air into and out of the lungs of a patient who is unable to breathe sufficiently.
( figurative ) Some behaviour or happening that relieves a tense atmosphere or situation .
( obsolete , slang ) A play or an actor so bad as to empty the theater .
